name: Memory Weaver
description:
Tamper with memories that no longer want to be remembered, you must go through what these customers went through in order to give them a clean slate.

Thanks for playing!


Credits
MijimoGO
NightFury
InkAndAmaranth
Vishal
Brad Spence



Riddles

[1]

“What has roots as nobody sees,

Is taller than trees,

Up, up it goes,

And yet never grows?”

[2] 

“Alive without breath,As cold as death;Never thirsty, ever drinking,All in mail never clinking."

[3]

“This thing all things devours;

Birds, beasts, trees, flowers;

Gnaws iron, bites steel;

Grinds hard stones to meal;

Slays king, ruins town,

And beats mountains down.”

Tolkien, J. R. R. The Hobbit 1937
